title: Didi (footballer, born 1982)
text:
Cleidimar Magalhães Silva (born 10 September 1982 in <a href="Itabira">Itabira</a>, <a href="Minas%20Gerais">Minas Gerais</a>), commonly known as Didi, is a retired <a href="Brazil">Brazil</a>ian <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a>er who played as a <a href="Striker%20%28association%20football%29">striker</a>.
Honours.
Player.
CFR Cluj
